skills.name: gemini-image-generation
skills.description: Generate professional images using Google's Gemini 3 Pro (quality, full control) or Gemini 2.5 Flash (speed, lower cost). Features AI-powered prompt enhancement using Google's Imagen best practices, custom aspect ratios, multiple resolutions, reference images, and Google Search grounding.
skills.author: Chirag Jain
features: AI-powered prompt enhancement using Google Imagen best practices
Two model options (Pro for quality, Flash for speed)
Google Search grounding for factual accuracy
